name: mdk-browser-extension
author: Frédéric Massart <fred@moodle.com> (http://fmcorz.net)
description: A collection of userscripts to make Moodle developers' life easier.

preferences.name: mdk_hosts
preferences.title: Limit to hosts
preferences.description: Hosts to limit the userscripts to (each separated by a pipe). This does not apply to scripts which run on specific domains (tracker.moodle.org, moodle.org, ...).

preferences.name: mdk_filemanager_shrinker_enabled
preferences.title: File Manager Shrinker
preferences.description: Enable File Manager Shrinker

preferences.name: moodleorg_markdown_selector_enabled
preferences.title: Moodle.org Markdown Selector
preferences.description: Enable Moodle.org Markdown Selector

preferences.name: mdk_pull_request_helper_enabled
preferences.title: Pull Request Helper
preferences.description: Enable Pull Request Helper

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_enabled
preferences.title: Toolbar
preferences.description: Enable Toolbar

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_admin_login
preferences.title: Toolbar admin login
preferences.description: The administrator login

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_admin_password
preferences.title: Toolbar admin password
preferences.description: The administrator password

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_teacher_prefix
preferences.title: Toolbar teacher prefix
preferences.description: The prefix used for your teacher accounts

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_teacher_password
preferences.title: Toolbar teacher password
preferences.description: The password of your teacher accounts

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_teacher_count
preferences.title: Toolbar teacher count
preferences.description: The number of teachers to randomly pick from

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_student_prefix
preferences.title: Toolbar student prefix
preferences.description: The prefix used for your student accounts

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_student_password
preferences.title: Toolbar student password
preferences.description: The password of your student accounts

preferences.name: mdk_toolbar_student_count
preferences.description: The number of students to randomly pick from

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_pull_branches_enabled
preferences.title: Tracker Pull Branches
preferences.description: Enable Tracker Pull Branches

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_pull_branches_repository
preferences.title: Tracker Pull Branches repository
preferences.description: Public git URL to your Moodle repository

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_pull_branches_branch
preferences.title: Tracker Pull Branches branch naming
preferences.description: How do you name your branch? Use %issue%, %version% and %suffix% as placeholders.

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_pull_branches_compare_url
preferences.title: Tracker Pull Branches compare URL
preferences.description: The URL to view the diff of your branche. Use %branch% and %with% as placeholders.

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_pull_branches_default_branches-listComma
preferences.title: Tracker Pull Branches default branches
preferences.description: Comma separated list of the default branches to select (22, 23, master).

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_pull_branches_compare_with_origin
preferences.title: Tracker Pull Branches compare with origin
preferences.description: If you are using github you won't have to push stable branches any more.

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_pull_branches_versions-dictPipeColon
preferences.title: Tracker Pull Branches version naming
preferences.description: How do you name your version? List separated by pipes and colons. (22:-22|23:-23|24:-master)

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_pull_branches_suffix-listPipe
preferences.title: Tracker Pull Branches suffix
preferences.description: How to separate the suffix from the rest of the branch. Separate what has to be before the suffix from what has to be after with a pipe.

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_tester_helper_enabled
preferences.title: Tracker Tester Helper
preferences.description: Enable Tracker Tester Helper

preferences.name: mdk_tracker_toggle_moodle_menu_enabled
preferences.title: Tracker Toggle Moodle.org Menu
preferences.description: Enable Tracker Toggle Moodle.org Menu
